There is a new manifest arc in my home directory:

~parkert/MANIFEST-20030728173947-0.arc.gz

It should be accurate.  It looks like the only things Heritrix is 
currently doing incorrectly are:

  - incorrect robots.txt parsing 
  - incorrectly parses null links (href="") -> /%22
  - misses link in links/pirates.swf to targets/flash.html

The first two are known problems.  The third would seem to indicate that 
there is a problem in the swf parsing module.  I will look into this.

Let me know if you have any questions,

pt.
-- 
Parker Thompson
The Internet Archive
510.541.0125
